Sun SPOT Telemetry Demo -- Host side

Package org.sunspotworld.demo

Host side of a simple telemetry application.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PacketTypes Packet types for Telemetry app
 

Class Summary
AccelerometerListener Simple example class to locate a remote service (on a SPOT), to connect to it and send it a variety of commands.
GraphView A simple class to store up to 10 minutes of telemetry data, display it on the screen, do some simple filtering of the data and read/write it to a file.
TelemetryFrame GUI creating code to make a window to display accelerometer data gathered from a remote SPOT.
 

Package org.sunspotworld.demo Description

Host side of a simple telemetry application.
